sections.title: What is Coding?
sections.content: Learn what coding is and how it's used to create games, apps, and websites. Discover how computers follow instructions just like you do!
sections.activity: Play a fun 'Simon Says' game where you act as the computer following instructions.

sections.title: Sequencing Adventures
sections.content: Explore how to give step-by-step instructions to solve problems or complete tasks.
sections.activity: Create a 'recipe' for making a silly sandwich, being as detailed as possible with each step.

sections.title: Loopy Fun
sections.content: Learn about loops and how they help us repeat actions without writing the same thing over and over.
sections.activity: Draw a colorful pattern using loops of shapes or colors.

sections.title: If This, Then That Magic
sections.content: Discover how computers make decisions using 'if-then' statements.
sections.activity: Play a guessing game where you use if-then statements to narrow down the options.
